tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE historical_stock_data (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol STRING,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE trading_strategies (
    strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name STRING,
    description STRING,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL,
    close_price DECIMAL,
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10),
    date DATE,
    high_price DECIMAL,
    low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
    symbol VARCHAR,
    date DATE,
    price DECIMAL,
    volume INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (symbol, date)
);

CREATE TABLE stock_prices (
  date DATE,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  open_price DECIMAL,
  close_price DECIMAL,
  high_price DECIMAL,
  low_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_trades (
  trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_id INT,
  date DATE,
  symbol VARCHAR(10),
  action VARCHAR(5),
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL
);
